text:
hi everyone! I am soon going to start developing a semi-large project. It's also going to be my first HubSpot project and I wanted to ask about your *workflows*! I am particularly interested in versioning and *GIT*. Do you guys develop locally and then upload all the changes? Do you work with git at all? What is your work process?

Also on another note, has anyone managed to work with *post CSS*? I think the nesting feature is really useful and would want to work with it more.
Thanks for all of your answers! Cheers!

Hi guys,

It would be great to show multiple companies in one quote template (*today I can show only one company*) attached screen.

Thanks.
Hi guys, how to make HubSpot livechat like this on chatflows?
